title: Email server connectivity intermittent
description: The main SMTP server is intermittently failing to send external emails, resulting in queued messages and delay notifications for users.

title: Need access to SharePoint Marketing folder
description: New marketing intern requires read/write access to the '2026 Campaign Assets' folder on the internal SharePoint site.

title: Reporting dashboard graphs failing to load
description: Users in the EMEA region report that all graphical elements (charts, gauges) on the main executive dashboard are showing blank/empty squares.

title: Request to update privacy policy link
description: The hyperlink to the Privacy Policy in the application footer points to an old, cached PDF. Need to update it to the new external URL.

title: Feature request: Dark Mode implementation
description: Customers frequently request a Dark Mode option for the main SaaS platform to reduce eye strain during evening use.

title: Checkout process fails on Chrome browser
description: When attempting to finalize a purchase using Google Chrome (latest version), the checkout button remains disabled. Works fine on Firefox.

title: Billing statement discrepancy for Q3 2025
description: Customer argues that the usage metrics recorded for July are incorrect, leading to an overcharge on their quarterly bill. Requires manual audit.

title: VPN connection drops every 30 minutes
description: Remote users are experiencing consistent disconnections from the corporate VPN exactly every half hour, requiring manual reconnection.

title: Accessibility issue: Insufficient color contrast
description: A recent audit revealed that the grey text on the light grey background in the help section does not meet WCAG AA contrast standards.

title: User account stuck in 'Pending Approval' state
description: A new user, 'Jane Smith', completed registration 48 hours ago but their account is still listed as pending activation in the admin portal.

title: Need to increase file upload size limit
description: Current system limits file uploads to 50MB. Customer needs this limit raised to 250MB to accommodate large media files.

title: Security vulnerability detected (XSS)
description: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability was found in the search input field, allowing injection of malicious scripts.

title: Internal application performance degradation
description: The main internal data processing application is running 5x slower than normal since the last deployment. Investigating possible memory leaks.

title: Missing translation for 'Pricing' page in German
description: When selecting the German language, the 'Pricing' page content remains entirely in English. All other pages seem correctly translated.

title: Error 500 when generating monthly PDF invoice
description: Customer receives a generic HTTP 500 error when attempting to download their detailed invoice for the current month from the user portal.
